description: React component for generating a draft SOW document based on company, project, and template data, with simulation of AI response.

methods.name: simulateGenerate
methods.description: Simulates AI response to generate a draft SOW, updates preview, and calls onDraft callback with the generated text.

search-terms: project overview scope deliverables roles acceptance

ctags.name: GenerateDraft
ctags.pattern: /^export default function GenerateDraft({ company, project, template, onDraft }) {$/
